description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. The Sugar Killerz is the perfect mix of cinematic adventure, CoOperative violence, stunning graphics and great music by AcidRider. Play it with 4 friends or with advanced AI companions. Enjoy this incredible cinematic experience! Official site: www.TheSugarKillerz.com
